text: The University of Nevada, Reno (Nevada, the University of Nevada, or UNR) is a public research university in Reno, Nevada. It was founded on October 12, 1874 in Elko, Nevada. It is a land grant institution in the state of Nevada. It is home to the state's first medical school. According to the National Science Foundation, UNR spent $144 million on research and development in 2018, ranking it 139th in the nation. ==References== Category:19th-century establishments in Nevada Category:1874 establishments in the United States Category:Colleges and universities in Nevada
title: University of Nevada, Reno
